meanings.definition: Of very poor quality or standard.
meanings.sent1: The movie we watched last night was really crappy.
meanings.sent2: I bought a crappy phone that stopped working after a week.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog refused to eat the crappy leftovers.
meanings.sent4: The crappy weather ruined our plans for a picnic.
meanings.sent5: The crappy old car sputtered and stalled on the highway.

meanings.definition: Feeling unwell or in a bad mood.
meanings.sent1: She woke up feeling crappy and tired.
meanings.sent2: I'm sorry for being so crappy to you earlier.
meanings.sent3: His crappy attitude made everyone avoid him.
meanings.sent4: The crappy news about the test results left her feeling down.
meanings.sent5: After a crappy day at work, all I wanted was to relax.
